entrypoints.name: step
entrypoints.buildCommand: mkdir -p build && RUST_LOG=debug cargo run --bin step --release build && mv ./target/release/step ./build/step

entrypoints.name: rotate
entrypoints.buildCommand: mkdir -p build && RUST_LOG=debug cargo run --bin rotate --release build && mv ./target/release/rotate ./build/rotate

entrypoints.name: dummy_step
entrypoints.buildCommand: mkdir -p build && RUST_LOG=debug cargo run --bin dummy_step --release build && mv ./target/release/dummy_step ./build/dummy_step

entrypoints.name: dummy_rotate
entrypoints.buildCommand: mkdir -p build && RUST_LOG=debug cargo run --bin dummy_rotate --release build && mv ./target/release/dummy_rotate ./build/dummy_rotate
